spec_data.Name: gvrng
spec_data.Description:
Guido Van Robot is a small, python based programming environment in which
students attempt to guide a small robot (styled after a LOGO environment), out
of various mazes using a python based programming language
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 03:21:59 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A robot driving game designed to introduce to kids to programming
